phrases: Father...
Father... Father...
Stop picking on my father!
R- run!
Gohan, run away!
Father...
All right, I have decided.
I think I will go back to where Mother is.
Are not I gotten to...
Kaio- sama's place yet?
I wonder if Goku has arrived at Kaio- sama's place
and is getting his training yet.
Uranai Baba- sama told us that even once we gather the Dragon Balls,
not to bring him back to life for a year.
Mmm...
And one year is right about the time when those Saiyan guys
are supposed to arrive here on earth.
I wonder if he will be able to defend earth against the Saiyans.
Bulma- san, are not we there yet?
There is no doubt that he is along this direction somewhere...
We have to find Tenshinhan- san and them quickly,
and climb up Karin-to Tower.
Yamucha- san might already have arrived there.
Earth's fate is in the balance.
Hey!
It is time to eat!
Come quick, Tenshinhan!
I have got some top-notch cooking ready for you!
Ten- san, it is incredible!
How is it that there is so much?
I hired these guys to make it all, of course!
I had nothing but first-rate ingredients brought together!
Right?
Must have cost some money.
Do not worry.
I just finished a pretty good job.
By the way, Tenshinhan,
how long are you planning on doing all this?
Until Ten- san beats Son Goku.
Cut it out, cut it out.
Things are peaceful now.
There is no use in getting any stronger.
And for that matter, you are strong enough as it is in the first place.
I am not so strong.
When I met Son, I learned that the world was a large place.
And it is not just Son, there is sure to be other strong guys out there in the world.
That is why I train.
How about, instead, you team up with me
and we hold up banks or something?
We could make a real bundle!
If we did, then you could eat as much of this delicious stuff as you want!
After all, from now on, money is everything!
Money talks in this world!
As long as we have money, we will be happy!
Are not you eating?
Ten- san, let us eat up!
That is more like it!
There is no need for you to hold back!
Go on, baldy, chow down!
R- right.
Y'know, Tenshinhan, holding up banks is fun!
Just by shooting off your gun, everybody gets the jitters!
Yeah, let us do it!
If you teamed up with me,
there is nothing we would have to fear!
We would be invincible!
Chaozu, training!
He is really got himself a hard head.
Ten- san can even break rocks with his head!
That is not what I meant... you stupid bastard!
I- I did not mean it!
Son, just what sort of training are you doing?
- Oni?
-Hey there!
What are you doing, Pops?
What am I doing, oni?
I was asked by Great King Yama- sama to clean this road oni.
I am going to Kaio- sama's place!
Oni!?
You are going to Kaio- sama's place?
I have never seen a daredevil dead person as big as you oni!
Is there still a long way to go?
Of course there is!
From what I have heard,
you are still only about halfway to the halfway point oni.
Still only halfway to halfway!?
It is pretty long then, huh?
Oni?
Hey, what is the matter oni?
I need a little break!
Oni.
If you want me to take you part of the way, I can give you a ride oni!
Get on back of here oni!
Really?
Yahoo!
Ready, Pops!
All right, here we go oni!
Chaozu!
Ten- san, you did it!
No.
I still have much more to do than just this.
O- oh, no!
How could I have done that?
l messed up the control over my power.
At this rate, it will reach where that kid is!
Hang in there, hang in there!
T- this is a big one!
And I cannot stand earthquakes!
Tenshinhan!
Tenshinhan!
Ten- san!
Ten- san!
I have located Tenshinhan!
Where the hell have you gone!?
I made it!
I am cold!
Huh?
Oh, my!
Have I done it again?
Apparently, he is within those mountains.
That is just the kind of place you would expect Tenshinhan- san to be training!
I am really sorry I have been a bother to you.
I will go back to the Kame House for now.
That will be great.
Please give Muten Roshi- sama my regards,
and tell him that we are continuing to train as he would expect of us.
Yes, you certainly are.
Okay then, take care of yourselves.
-Be careful.
-Farewell!
Chaozu, now we can devote ourselves to training.
She is an odd person.
Such pretty flowers!
They smell nice!
Stupid bastards!
I have been looking for you, you know!
You are trying to get rid of me, but I will not have it!
Now cut out that stuff already, and get over here!
Keep out of this!
B- bullets!?
I- impossible!
To think that Son could have died!
But Goku is training in the Other World.
And we need to be sure that we can keep up when the two Saiyans get here.
Kami- sama is going to be training you, after all!
Ten- san!
It is something better than I could have hoped for!
We will go immediately!
Ten- san, we can train!
What is more...
What is it, baldy!?
Hey, Tenshinhan...
If you are trying to run away from me, I am not about to let you.
I do not care if you are going to Kami- sama's place or anywhere else,
I am going to come with you.
l'm going to have Kami-sama train me through-and-through!
Son, let us make sure we meet again!
Kaio- sama, I am Son Goku...
Oni!
Yow!
Kaio- sama, you are training is as tough as I expected...
Ee-yow!!
W- where is this place?
I wonder if I have arrived at Kaio- sama's place without even realizing it.
That smells good!
That fruit looks delicious!
Just where exactly has Goku fallen into?
And as Umigame was anxious about,
and the Turtle Hermit was unable to offer a reply to,
will Goku and the others be able to defend earth against the Saiyans?
